info.name: Dark R4P3
info.description:
This modifies the r4p3.net forum to become a dark look and saves your eyelight :)
P.S. The screenshots are outdated.
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:

1.0 - Initial release (<time datetime="2015-11-10 18:00">2015-11-10 18:00</time>)
1.1 - First fixes for header and footer (<time datetime="2015-11-10 18:30">2015-11-10 18:30</time>)
1.2 - Some other fixes and additions (<time datetime="2015-27-11 18:30">2015-27-11 05:19</time>)
1.2.1 - Even more fixes (<time datetime="2016-02-16 21:15">2016-02-16 21:15</time>)
1.2.2 - Added some colors + fixed more transparent layers (<time datetime="2016-02-20 11:09">2016-02-20 11:09</time>)
1.2.3 - Moderation/Report Notification colors + Now works on *.r4p3.net & *.rape.ru.com  (<time datetime="2016-02-20 18:46">2016-02-20 18:46</time>)
1.2.5 - Moved "Add helpful icons to links 2" to own style: https://userstyles.org/styles/124510/add-helpful-icons-to-links-2
1.3 - Added some options + many other changes =D
1.3.1 - Added unix time option
1.3.2 - Added colored teamnames + fixed most colors
1.3.3 - Added marquee for quote + more visible unread boards
